comment.description: Optional. A human-readable description or note for developers or modders; ignored by the interpreter at runtime.

condition.description: Optional. If present, this operation only executes if the JSON-Logic condition evaluates to true.

Parameters.description: Parameters for MODIFY_ARRAY_FIELD. Atomically modifies an array within a component.

field.description: Required. Dot-separated path to the array field within the component.

mode.description: The operation to perform: 'push' adds a value, 'push_unique' adds a value if it's not already present, 'remove_by_value' removes the first matching value, 'pop' removes the last value.

value.description: The value to add or remove. Required for 'push', 'push_unique' and 'remove_by_value'.

result_variable.description: Optional. For 'pop', stores the removed item. For others, can store the modified array.
